title: Tidy Personal Folder
summary: Organize and clean up files in personal directory
description: Regular maintenance to keep personal folder organized. Remove temporary files, organize documents into appropriate subdirectories, and ensure important files are properly named.

todo.title: Remove old temporary files
todo.notes: Delete any .tmp, .bak, or other temporary files older than 10 cycles

todo.title: Update file naming conventions
todo.notes: Ensure files follow consistent naming patterns
